A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I left the cinema with mixed feelings after being extremely  excited for the movie. The more I think about the movie the more dissapointed I find my self. I am sure I will just parrot many others but I there were just so many things wrong for me. Seems like the new director just shat on everything JJ set up in episode VII\, starting with Luke throwing his sword away and that trend continues through out the whole movie. I won't even get into all the blatant agendas that were shoved down pur throats in a fantasy movie ... that being said\, I am still cheering for SW and I hope the next one will be better.
